subject: Question about espresso machine maintenance
description: I need help understanding how often I should descale my espresso machine. I use it about 5 times per day.

messages.message: I need help understanding how often I should descale my espresso machine. I use it about 5 times per day.

Hi! For your usage level (5 times per day), we recommend descaling every 2-3 weeks. You should also clean the portafilter and steam wand after each use. Would you like specific instructions for the descaling process?
Yes, please send me the descaling instructions. Thank you!
I've sent you a detailed descaling guide via email. The process takes about 30 minutes and should be done with our recommended descaling solution. Let me know if you have any other questions!

subject: Order delivery delay
description: My order was supposed to arrive yesterday but I haven't received it yet. Order number is ORD-123.

messages.message: My order was supposed to arrive yesterday but I haven't received it yet. Order number is ORD-123.
I'm sorry to hear about the delay. Let me check with our shipping partner and get back to you with an update within 2 hours.
